data.eml:eml: Ptilodactyla crenatostriata Redtenbacher, 1868 (Coleoptera: Ptilodactylidae) transferred to Phytocerum Costa, Vanin, Lawrence & Ide, 2003 (Coleoptera: Cerophytidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jäch, Manfred (2017): Ptilodactyla crenatostriata Redtenbacher, 1868 (Coleoptera: Ptilodactylidae) transferred to Phytocerum Costa, Vanin, Lawrence & Ide, 2003 (Coleoptera: Cerophytidae). Zootaxa 4324 (2): 371-377, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4324.2.9
